term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - maximum tolerable concentration (MTC)
term.title: maximum tolerable concentration

item.text: Highest concentration of a substance in an environmental medium that does not cause death of test organisms or species (denoted by LC0).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2067 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
